name: Desi Driver 3D
description: In Desi Driver 3D, game you have to avoid collision with Obstacles on road which are Barricade on roads. If your car collides with barricade the your car will burst and Game Over. Your Highest Score will be saved for to show your Friends and Challenge them to Break your score. The 3d models are Low poly to make run on any device with ease. You have a classic 3d car to drive. and avoid obstacles.
